title: fix: simplify balance API to return single balance field
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: The balance API endpoint now returns a single unified balance field, simplifying integration for developers.
gist.impact: This streamlines the API response and ensures consistent behavior for API keys with specific budgets.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee organizing digital coins into a single neat stack. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'BALANCE'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
